title: Goldenâ˜…Kids
synopsis: The Koganedai Downtown FC Golden Kids haven't won a single game since they formed. The captain and goal keeper, Goal Kitagawa is determined to win a game with the current members before he moves away next month. However, even after all the determination to win the next game they lose terribly, extending their losing streak to 22 games. Even the adults in the community who support the team begin to get fed up with all the losses.
staff: [['Hamana, Takayuki', ['Director']], ['Hiramitsu, Takuya', ['Sound Director']], ['Yoshida, Reiko', ['Series Composition']], ['Takahashi, Yoichi', ['Original Creator']]]
